attributes.action: Officially recognise Soviet dissidents for their pivotal role in bringing the Cold War to an end
attributes.additional_details: Following the 25th Anniversary of the fall of the Berlin Wall, to call on Her Majesty’s Government to find a prominent way to officially recognise Soviet-era dissidents, particularly those now living in Britain, for their bravery and sacrifice in the course of freedom, peace, civil liberties and for bringing the Cold War to an end.
